alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 11:23PM EDT until May 03 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Fulton County in western Kentucky... South central Mississippi County in southeastern Missouri... East central New Madrid County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1022 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hunter-Dawson State Historic Site to 6 miles southeast of Marston to 6 miles northeast of Reelfoot Lake State Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Dorena and Hickman. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
